descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2u93db7.jpg[/IMG]
This is my second mod, Varte. Varte is an underground player home just outside of Winterhold. There are many secrets to be found within the ruins, so keep an open eye out for notes and inspect your surroundings.  Fast travel enabled. If you enjoyed please consider an endorsement. 

Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=111743928

INSTALLATION: 

Use NMM found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager/

                                     OR

Manually extract with WINRAR (http://www.rarlab.com/) or 7zip (http://www.7-zip.org/) to your Skyrim data directory (usually C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data).

UNINSTALLATION:

Delete \'Varte.esp and any other related files 

                                             OR


Use NMM


NOTE: Not follower friendly, if anyone is willing to take the time to navmesh the house, then please contact me.

MAKE SURE YOU PICK UP THE KEY UNDER THE ROCK PILE TO YOUR RIGHT




[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2qs0ytj.jpg[/IMG]

-Large throne room, complete with merchant and bard

-Guards

-Oversized bed chamber

-Armoury

-Library

-Study

-Wine Cellar

-Plenty of personalised storage

-Display cases and weapon racks to display your arsenal

-Just outside of Winterhold, fast travel enabled

[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2hz7cwx.jpg[/IMG]

You can contact me via the comments, PM, or here: forxionteam@gmail.com


[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/iw3l9d.jpg[/IMG]

-Possible bard glitch
author: TheLeftenant
